articles.title: Zee halves workforce at tech and innovation centre in Bengaluru to aid cost cutting - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company recently announced the strategic realignment of its revenue vertical, that is now being directly driven by the MD & CEO
articles.content:
After some senior-level exits, Zee Entertainment has now trimmed its workforce at the technology and innovation centre in Bengaluru as part of a cost-cutting measure.
